health_literacy_estimate.long_description: The health literacy composite captures the adult population's ability to obtain, process, and understand basic health services to make appropriate health decisions. Health literacy composite is based on variables of demographic characteristics, health status, and health care use.
health_literacy_estimate.short_description: Health literacy composite captures the adult population's ability to obtain, process, and understand basic health services to make appropriate health decisions
health_literacy_estimate.statement: The health literacy composite for {features.name} is {value}.

perc_post_hs_edu.long_description: Percentage of the population self-reported to have post-secondary education. Based on American Community Survey Table B15003 in ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates.
perc_post_hs_edu.short_description: Percentage of the population self-reported to have post-secondary education
perc_post_hs_edu.statement: {value} of the population in {features.name} has a post-secondary education.

num_post_hs_edu.long_description: Number of people who self-reported to have post-secondary education. Based on American Community Survey Table B15003 in ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates.
num_post_hs_edu.long_name: Number of people with post-secondary education
num_post_hs_edu.short_description: Number of people who self-reported to have post-secondary education
num_post_hs_edu.statement: {value} people in {features.name} have a post-secondary education.

liang17.title: Health Literacy Universal Precautions Are Still a Distant Dream: Analysis of U.S. Data on Health Literate Practices

savitz20.title: Treatment selection and medication adherence for stable angina: The role of area-based health literacy
savitz20.journal: Journal of Evaluation in Clinical Practice
